sentence.text: However, little is known regarding regulation of synapse assemblyK/cofilin and SSH in human colorectal cancer (CRC).
We show that active cofilin, LIMK1, LIMK2, and regulation of cellular protein metabolic process are overexpressed in human CRC and are associated with tumor progression parameters.

entity.text: regulation of cellular protein metabolic process

sentence.text: Our results suggest that F-actin regulators regulation of synapse assemblyK/cofilin pathway and SSH1 are associated with CRC progression and chemoresistance representing promising tumor biomarkers and therapeutic targets in CRC
